mainText:
The whole world has lost a great leader. A unique person, a true genius 
who was on a par with men like Einstein and Da Vinci! He will never be 
replaced by anyone... But we know that wherever he goes, he will truly 
make that place a better place as he did in our world! The world is 
better today because of him.
header: The lost of a great leader!
author: Juan
